duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide environmental health and hygiene assessment services to clients, including the development of assessment strategies, fieldwork, and technical report writing.
Assist in obtaining and performing customer contracts, executing sales plans, and reaching production goals.
Develop appropriate project scope of work and associated costs, conduct field assessments, and interact with clients and monitored employees.
Complete technical reports and projects in a timely fashion, maintain customer satisfaction, and develop new contacts.
Maintain sales goals, conduct sales plans, and ensure compliance with safety regulations.

education_certification.credential: B.S degree in related field required. Professional certification and advanced degree(s) beneficial (CSP or CIH), with intended growth into a senior role and obtaining certification as an industrial hygienist.
Significant (5 -10+ years) experience in a similar position required. Intermediate computer literacy and dynamic public speaking skills are essential.
